name: Super Nova
storyline: In a far away galaxy, known only to those with knowledge and joy, the next-level line of planets coexists in peace. The main planet of this long line of spheres, called Saturnara, is a place of entertainment and the celebration of life. But things sometimes break beyond recognition, Fallen Angels hate the peace they weren't allowed, and thus, their one wish is to take control over the planet's very essence, it's soul. But that's all fairytales and legends, isn't it? Besides I'm Nova! No one's gonna get through me as long as I'm here!
summary: Welcome to Super Nova! A 2D fast-paced platformer with emphasis on keeping your speed, quick combat, and bosses that will keep you on your toes to beat 'em up!
